title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\FractionSplit
name: FractionSplit
description:
Assigns the input data to training, validation, and test sets as per the given fractions. Any of training_fraction, validation_fraction and test_fraction may optionally be provided, they must sum to up to 1. If the provided ones sum to less than 1, the remainder is assigned to sets as decided by Vertex AI. If none of the fractions are set, by default roughly 80% of data is used for training, 10% for validation, and 10% for test.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.FractionSplit

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.training_fraction
params.description: The fraction of the input data that is to be used to train the Model.

params.name: data.validation_fraction
params.description: The fraction of the input data that is to be used to validate the Model.

params.name: data.test_fraction
params.description: The fraction of the input data that is to be used to evaluate the Model.
